error.message: Class Drupal\saml\Event\SamlFindAccountEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead
Class Drupal\saml\Event\SamlLoginEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead
Class Drupal\saml\Event\SamlSettingsEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead
Call to deprecated function user_password(). Deprecated in drupal:9.1.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Password\PasswordGeneratorInterface::generate() instead.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
The drupal/core requirement is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal. Either remove it or update it to be compatible. See https://drupal.org/node/2514612#s-drupal-9-compatibility.
